questions.question: Which GPIO pin numbering scheme is most commonly used in Raspberry Pi programming?
What is the maximum safe voltage that can be applied to a Raspberry Pi GPIO pin?
Which Raspberry Pi component allows you to connect to a network without cables?
What is the main function of I2C pins on a Raspberry Pi?

answers.b: To connect to serial devices like sensors

questions.question: What is the default logic level for a Raspberry Pi GPIO pin set as OUTPUT?
